column1: # - source: Where the evidence came from

column7: Team spent 30 minutes debating whether relationship was 3 or 5 without data
Output quality depends on input quality - need evidence not opinions
Log captures real observations with evidence and source
5/3/1 scale creates ambiguity about magnitude differences
Binary exists/doesn't-exist is clearer than magnitude judgment
Multiple observers can contribute observations independently
System treats features as independent but some have prerequisites
